price: ߕ߭ ߛ ߸ ߘߐ߬ߛߊߙߌ ߟߝߊߙߌ ߟߎ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߢߌ߲߬ ߘߌ߫ ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߟߍߙߊ߫ ߘߐߞߣߍߣߍ߲
arabic: طسٓۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ وَكِتَابٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: tta-seen til'ka āyātu al-qur'āni wakitābin mubīnin
